settings.title: SUPPORT RESOURCES
settings.content:
For Private Labeling and Information about Custom Cards:

Toll Free: 888-849-4999

settings.copyright_text: V Syndicate, LLC® Protected by issued and pending patents, foreign and domestic. Our products are not intended for use with any controlled substances. Our products are intended for tobacco use only or with legal herbs and spices.

settings.newsletter_text: We know you're busy, so we'll only update you when we have new releases, sales, and important facts to share.
Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.title: Get in touch
settings.subtitle: Subheading

settings.title: How do you ship my order?
settings.subtitle: We offer various shipping methods through USPS. Please check with them on tracking once your order has shipped.

settings.title: How will I know when my order has shipped?
settings.subtitle: Once the order is processed and the shipping label is created you will receive an email, with your tracking number included.

settings.title: Do you ship on weekends?
settings.subtitle: We ship and process orders Monday through Friday during business hours of 9AM-5PM Pacific Standard Time.

settings.title: How long does shipping take? How quickly can you ship my order?
settings.subtitle: There are various shipping options depending on how quickly you wish to receive the item. Please allow for extra time regarding orders outside of the United States.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally? What is the cost?
settings.subtitle:
Yes, we do ship internationally. Shipping totals are calculated during checkout. Please bear in mind that some countries are more susceptible to packages being intercepted by customs, and withheld. There is nothing we can do about this.

*Due to issues with various carriers shipping and delivering to South Africa, we cannot deliver there at this time.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.subtitle: You have 14 days from the date received to return your product. The items must be unused, and you are responsible for paying the return shipping cost.

settings.title: How can I process a refund or exchange my product for something else?
settings.subtitle: Please reach out to customer support at info@v-syndicate.com.

settings.title: What are the payment methods?
settings.subtitle: You can pay for your order via credit card. Unfortunately we cannot accept PayPal.

settings.title: Can I use Paypal to pay for my order? How does it work?
settings.subtitle: No; we apologize for the inconvenience.

settings.title: Do you offer wholesale?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we offer wholesale on our stock products. Please refer to our “Wholesale” tab. Wholesale products are sold to qualified businesses only.

settings.title: How can I place a wholesale order?
settings.subtitle: Please head to our “Wholesale” tab and submit an inquiry. You will receive a response from our staff in 24-48 hours.

settings.title: How long does it take to process my wholesale order?
settings.subtitle: Please direct your questions to info@v-syndicate.com and our staff will reply within 24-48 hours.

settings.title: Is there a minimum purchase requirement?
settings.subtitle: Please contact info@v-syndicate.com, minimum order quantities vary for most products.

settings.title: I’m interested in a custom tray, can I order just one?
settings.subtitle: We do not offer one offs—there is a minimum purchase requirement for every custom product. Please contact us for details.

settings.title: Can I submit a design for your stock trays?
settings.subtitle: At this time we are not taking private inquiries on stock product designs.

settings.title: Do you offer custom packaging for my custom order?
settings.subtitle: Custom Grinder Cards do have customizable sleeves, but not every item offers this option. Custom packaging is possible for most products, if minimum order quantities are met. Please inquire at info@v-syndicate.com for additional details.

settings.title: What is the production time on custom orders?
settings.subtitle: Production times vary between products. Grinder Cards, for example, take approximately 4-6 weeks to produce and ship and 3-4 weeks for repeat designs. For production times on our other custom products please contact info@v-syndicate.com.

settings.title: What is the cost breakdown on custom products?
settings.subtitle: Prices vary between products. Please inquire at info@v-syndicate.com for pricing details.

settings.title: How much will I be required to pay upfront?
settings.subtitle: We require 50% of the payment to place the order, and the remaining 50% to ship the order.

settings.title: Is there a way to receive a sample of my custom product before I place an order?
settings.subtitle: Samples of any custom product can be made before mass production, please inquire at info@v-syndicate.com as product sample cost varies depending on which item.

settings.title: How can I become a brand ambassador/model?
settings.subtitle: Please email any brand ambassador inquiries to socialmedia@v-syndicate.com

settings.title: Do you ever do product trades in exchange for social media content?
settings.subtitle: Send us a DM on Instagram or email socialmedia@v-syndicate.com with your content ideas and examples. If we feel that you suit our style we’ll send you a package!

settings.title: innovative. compact. durable.
settings.subtitle: keep your brand on the edge of their fingertips.

settings.title: V SYNDICATE
settings.content: V Syndicate is a lifestyle accessories brand built for the cannabis industry, offering versatile products since 2010. The foundation of our company was set on our invention of the Grinder Card—a compact, advanced, flat herb grinder. We also create a variety of other unique collections listed here to elevate your promotional materials to the next level.

settings.title: PATENTED QUALITY
settings.content: We hold the patents for our grinder surfaces, which are all finger-friendly and offered in three teeth variants for different herb consistency outcomes. Our products are always highly crafted using medical grade stainless steel to withstand every use.

settings.title: IN THE BUSINESS OF GREEN
settings.content: Offering eco-friendly products is second nature to us, providing the greenest herb grinders in the industry that require only 5% of the metal used to produce a standard rotary grinder. We take pride in our attention to detail when it comes to sustainable design.

settings.custom_html:
❮
❯

READY TO ELEVATE YOUR BRAND?

Customize on our builder and send us an inquiry!

Custom Builder

Get A Quote

settings.title: Dabit Cards
settings.text: Take the sesh on-the-go with the herb and wax user’s Swiss Army Knife. Dabit Cards are offered in two size options with anywhere from two to three double-sided magnetic dab tools, an herb grinder surface, and option to add a silicone cover to protect against residue. Necklace and hat pin options also available.

settings.title: Metal Trays
settings.text: Set the foundation of every sesh with a durable tray that can withstand the hits. Crafted with metal and offered in three sizes so you can cater to any client's need, from travel to home use.

settings.title: Glass Trays
settings.text: Crafted to give a unique edge to an essential. Gift your clients with style as solid as this shatter resistant tempered glass. Each tray is offered in two sizes and designed with easy to clean lowered edges.

settings.contact_heading: Contact Us to Keep Clients Lifted
settings.contact_content: Fill out the form below and a sales associate will contact you with information on how you can customize our products for your brand. Please note: We do not offer one-offs or individually customized cards---wholesale orders only.

settings.subtitle: Showcasing all the ways our collections can suit your style...

settings.title: TAKE IT HIGHER
settings.content: Elevating every smoke sesh with the most innovative products made from the highest quality materials.

settings.title: WHAT WE DO
settings.content:
At V Syndicate, we specialize in all things smoking accessories. 

We pride ourselves in making high quality rolling trays, herb grinders, and stash jars. Our team has consistently pushed the envelope when it comes to creating new, exciting products for an ever growing industry. We started with the invention of the very first grinder card, and have continued to innovate with products such as the first hybrid rolling tray, and the first glass trays to ever be printed in full color. 

We even offer wholesale smoking products for those looking to buy in bulk, simply fill out the contact form and our sales team will get back to you right away.

Our Products

Glass Rolling Trays: Made from tempered glass, these dope trays are shatter-resistant and feature high resolution designs. Metal Rolling Trays: Our metal trays are lightweight, durable, and feature the coolest rolling tray designs. Rotary Grinders: We offer two lines of grinders, our SharpShred grinders and our ceramic grinder collection, the CleanCut grinders.So much more! We offer plenty of unique products like our dab tool necklaces and even posters!

Ready to reinvent your brand? If you're a first time customer we offer free graphic design assistance!

Fill out the form below and our sales team will get back to you right away!

Please note: We do not offer one-offs! There is a unit minimum that
varies depending on collection.

{formbuilder:5897}

settings.title: Custom Rolling Trays
settings.content: If you want to sell cool rolling trays with your very own brand name, you’re in luck. We offer private labeling for all of our rolling tray lines, including our glass rolling trays,metal rolling trays, and hybrid trays. We have what we think are the best rolling trays on the market, so you’re always putting your name on a quality product. Our trays are durable, made from high quality material, and are always printed in high definition full color. If you need help with designing your product, we offer design assistance so that you receive a product that is just right. Whether you’re looking for trippy rolling trays,cute rolling trays, or rolling trays that are just straight dope, our team of designers can help you out. We also offer wholesale rolling trays if you are interested in any of the designs on our website.

settings.title: Custom Grinders
settings.content: Both of our rotary grinder collections are available for private labeling. Our SharpShred herb grinders easily cut through even the densest of flower and come equipped with a durable pollen screen and two mini scrapers. These 4 piece grinders come in both 50mm and 63mm sizes and are made from super durable metal. If you are looking for ceramic grinders, our CleanCut line is for you. These non stick grinders come with ceramic-coated teeth so that no residue builds up on the inside of the grinder, and feature all of the same capabilities as our SharpShreds.

settings.title: Custom Stash Boxes
settings.content: Our Syndicase collection offers the most durable,portable stash boxes on the market. These small stash boxes are available for private labeling and are always printed in high resolution full color. Perfect for on-the-go use, these smell proof stash boxes can hold papers, flower, filters, lighters, and carts, while still being small enough to throw in your pocket.

settings.title: Other Products Offered
settings.content: We offer private labeling for all other smoking accessories on our website, except for our SmartStash line. If you have any questions about creating a custom product, reach out to our sales team using the form below.

settings.title: Meet the team
settings.text: Say a little something about your team here, tell the story of how you got together, describe what roles people play, and help your customers get to know you better! All your staff members can be listed below, with their respective photos, job titles, descriptions or mini-bios, and Twitter handles.
